description: The AWS::Logs::Destination resource specifies a CloudWatch Logs destination. A destination encapsulates a physical resource (such as an Amazon Kinesis data stream) and enables you to subscribe that resource to a stream of log events.

Arn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

DestinationName.description: The name of the destination resource
DestinationName.markdownDescription:
The name of the destination resource

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 512  

Pattern: ^[^:*]{1,512}$  

Update requires: No interruption

DestinationPolicy.description: An IAM policy document that governs which AWS accounts can create subscription filters against this destination.
DestinationPolicy.markdownDescription:
An IAM policy document that governs which AWS accounts can create subscription filters against this destination.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1    

Update requires: No interruption

RoleArn.description: The ARN of an IAM role that permits CloudWatch Logs to send data to the specified AWS resource
RoleArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of an IAM role that permits CloudWatch Logs to send data to the specified AWS resource

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1    

Update requires: No interruption

TargetArn.description: The ARN of the physical target where the log events are delivered (for example, a Kinesis stream)
TargetArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the physical target where the log events are delivered (for example, a Kinesis stream)

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1    

Update requires: No interruption
